item.title: 'Major step': French MPs vote in favour of bill to ban social media for under-15s
item.description: If the bill passes the upper house it could take effect by the start of France’s new school year in September.

item.title: 'Major step': French MPs vote in favour of bill to ban social media for under-15s - BBC
item.description: ‘Major step’: French MPs vote in favour of bill to ban social media for under-15s BBCFrance’s National Assembly approves banning under-15s from social media Reuters‘Our children’s brains are not for sale’: Macron says France to fast-track social media ban for under-15s CNNFrance’s Macron pushes for fast-track ban on social media for kids under 15 CBS NewsFrench lawmakers vote to ban social media use by under-15s The Guardian
